segments.text: I see the water just pouring over the sink, and the woman doesn’t even notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are being so clever, sneaking cookies like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really stretching to reach that jar, and the girl is just waiting patiently.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think it’s funny how the woman is so focused on drying dishes while everything else is falling apart.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks like it’s about to tip, but the boy is determined to get those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is so cute, just standing there with her hand out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is making such a mess, but the woman is completely unbothered.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I love how the kids are working together to get what they want.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so peaceful, but inside it’s pure entertainment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but smile at how oblivious the woman is to everything.
segments.speaker: PAR
